Args.name: Args

unions.name: OptionType
unions.comment:
The type of option passed.

`ShortOption` represents an option passed with a single `-` character. `LongOption` represents
an option passed with two `-` characters.

aliases.name: Result
aliases.comment: The result of parsing a set of arguments.
aliases.type: { args : Array.Array String.String, options : Dict.Dict String.String { optionType : Args.OptionType, values : Array.Array String.String } }

values.name: parse
values.comment:
Parse an array of strings that's returned by the `gren-lang/node` package
`Terminal` module.

For examples and more detailed documentation on how this works, check the
package README.
